title: Panettone French toast with berries
ingredients: ['3 eggs', '80ml single cream', '80ml milk', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 rounds panettone, cut horizontally about 1.5cm thick and quartered', '250g mixed berries (frozen and thawed, or fresh)', '2 tablespoons icing sugar, plus extra for dusting', '40g unsalted butter', 'thick cream or yoghurt to serve']
